name: Five Star Concierge
description:
Your job is to check our esteemed guests in and hand them the key to their perfect room.  Each guest will have a list of requirements; use the provided hotel map to be sure the room key you hand over fulfills all their requests.  Errors in this regard will net our hotel negative reviews, and too many negative reviews will cost you your job!  Failure to admit the daily quota of guests in a timely manner will also get you fired.  No stress!  

Made for the GDK Summer Game Jam 2021.

CREDITS
Tempe Zaliauskas - Design, programming, art, SFX
Wildcard- Character art, SFX
Colby Breitenbach- Music production, 2D art
Sounds used with permission from fesliyanstudios.com
